title: Portfolio
description: A portfolio built with React and Vite, representing my work and projects. It includes a modern design with responsive layout and animations.

title: Diabetes Prediction using Machine Learning
description: A machine learning project that predicts the lilelihood of diabetes in patients using Scikit-learn.

title: Weather App using Java
description: A basic weather application developed in Java that fetches and displays real-time weather data for any city.

title: Education-system frontend
description: A modern and responsive education system web application built using React and styled with Tailwind CSS.

title: Chatbot with personality
description: A AI-powered chatbot capable of mimicking multiple human personalities using tools like transformers, gradio.
